subject: Firmware Support
description_text: Would you guys happen to have firmware for the Simsonn P3-H3 to use key press input instead of axis input?

conversations.body_text: Hi Christian Punla,  Which game do you plan to use it with? If the game does not support axis input, you will need to switch to button mode instead. I can forward your request to our software team for evaluation.

Maplestory, World of Warcraft, League of Legends.

________________________________
Hi Christian Punla,  This is not a racing game, so it is not supported.
